definition: A leisurely activity involving riding on horseback, typically done outside of an enclosed area or stable. It is commonly enjoyed as a recreational pursuit or as a way to explore nature and the outdoors.

examples.german: Ich mache gerne einen Ausritt im Wald.
examples.english: I enjoy going for a ride in the forest.

examples.german: Sie planten einen Ausritt entlang des Flusses.
examples.english: They planned a ride along the river.

examples.german: Der Ausritt mit den Pferden war sehr entspannend.
examples.english: The horse ride was very relaxing.
